headline: McDonald's Balances Caviar Promo, Menu Cuts And Store Closure Before Earnings
summary: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) has launched a limited edition McNugget Caviar kit as part of its Valentine's Day promotion in 2026. The company is adjusting its UK vegetarian menu, with most meat free items removed following customer feedback. A long running McDonald's location in the US is set to close permanently, ending a decades long presence in its local community. For you as an investor, these updates highlight how McDonald's balances brand marketing, menu decisions, and its physical...

headline: Cisco Earnings, Jobs Report, CPI Data: What to Watch This Week
summary: This week brings a deluge of economic indicators, particularly jobs and inflation reports, which were stalled by the recent government shutdown. Investors will also navigate earnings reports and appearances by Federal Reserve policymakers.

headline: Armada Named McDonald’s U.S. Supplier of the Year for 2025
summary: --Armada set new standards that strengthen collaboration and performance across McDonald’s supplier ecosystem--PITTSBURGH, Feb. 10, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Armada has been named McDonald’s U.S. Supplier of the Year for 2025, recognizing the company’s leadership, innovation, and unwavering commitment to supply chain excellence.
